x86x64::GpVarÂ¶

struct asmjit::x86x64::GpVar
#include <x86defs.h>

Gp variable.

Public Functions

GpVar()

Create new uninitialized GpVar instance.

GpVar(BaseCompiler & c, uint32_t type = kVarTypeIntPtr, const char * name = NULL)

Create new initialized GpVar instance.

GpVar(const GpVar & other)

Create new GpVar instance using other.

Note this will not create a different variable, use Compiler::newGpVar() if you want to do so. This is only copy-constructor that allows to store the same variable in different places.

GpVar(const _NoInit &)

Create new uninitialized GpVar instance (internal).

GpVar clone()

Clone GpVar operand.

void reset()

Reset GpVar operand.

GpVar r8()

Cast this variable to 8-bit (LO) part of variable.

GpVar r8Lo()

Cast this variable to 8-bit (LO) part of variable.

GpVar r8Hi()

Cast this variable to 8-bit (HI) part of variable.

GpVar r16()

Cast this variable to 16-bit part of variable.

GpVar r32()

Cast this variable to 32-bit part of variable.

GpVar r64()

Cast this variable to 64-bit part of variable.

GpVar & operator=(const GpVar & other)

bool operator==(const GpVar & other)

bool operator!=(const GpVar & other)

Protected Functions

GpVar(const GpVar & other, uint32_t reg, uint32_t size)
